name: Ken
bio: I like to eat peanut butter and jelly sandwiches.

messages.message: I licked the knife after spreading the peanut butter on my sandwich, should I use it again or wash it?

ai_replies.full: You should probably wash it, using it agin might be a little gross.
Just use it again, who cares right?

goto.message: Alright, I guess you're right, it would be gross.
Eh, you only live once right?
